body.name: IUGA High Waist Yoga Pants with Pockets, Leggings for Women Tummy Control, Workout Leggings for Women 4 Way Stretch
features: Snug & Comfortable Fit - Crafted from buttery-soft & 4-way stretch fabric, IUGA leggings feel like a gentle caress on your skin, allowing you to exercise without limits. These yoga pants not only prioritize your comfort but also wick away moisture to keep you comfortable all day while ensuring opacity for worry-free workouts.

Sculpting High Waisted Leggings - IUGA leggings for women are designed with a high waist for a secure and snug fit, gently embracing your midsection to create a flat tummy look while maintaining unbeatable comfort. Whether you're at work or hitting the gym, our workout leggings guarantee a day filled with both comfort and style.

Hands-Free Comfort - IUGA womens leggings come equipped with two spacious side pockets and an additional hidden inner pocket in the waistband. You can effortlessly stash your phone, keys, or essentials at your fingertips without weighing down your compression leggings.

Sporty Yet Stylish - Enjoy versatile comfort with our leggings designed for all-day wear. Whether you're exercising, running errands, or relaxing at home, these leggings with pockets provide a perfect blend of style and ease. With their stretchy, breathable fabric, you'll feel comfortable and confident in any setting.

IUGA is a lifestyle brand that combines Style, Comfort and Performance. The High Quality Activewear is perfect for Fitness Enthusiasts and Everyday Athleisure as it is Affordable and Accessible. Operating at the cross section between fashion and function, IUGA aims to please both The Everyday Fashion Consumer and The Ultimate Exercise Enthusiast.

Side pockets and hidden pocket for easy access to your phone or small items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality at bargain price
reviews.reviewText: These leggings are try to size and made of thick and soft material. They come in nice colors and have excellent pockets. The pants stay put. The wide waistband is flattering and pants stay put even if running with phone and keys weighing them down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable leggings I own
reviews.reviewText: Like many, I read about these leggings in Wirecutter, and the price was good, so I decided to give them a try. I LOVE them. Most comfortable leggings I’ve ever owned, much better than some of the more expensive ones. No need to tug, reposition, etc. every time I move around. Loved them so much, I decided to buy another pair- then I bought two more. Very soft; nice compression. The reviews certainly are all over the place on size, so I will give this info in case it helps someone. I am 5’4”, and range from 130-135 lbs. The Medium fits perfectly! I typically wear a size 8 petite or MP in almost all clothing. Leggings are often too long in the stride for me, even petite-sized ones, which makes the waist come up too high, and petite leggings are often too short for me.. Not these. Just perfect for me in every way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizes have changed but they are the best leggings ever.
reviews.reviewText: In March of 2023, I purchase 4 pairs of leggings that are size small. When I received them & tried them on, I fell in love. I am 125 pounds & they fit amazing. They have tight compression throughout the thighs & legs which I love. They have pockets on both sides that can hold my chapstick, phone, vape & keys. They do not slide down at all, they stay in place on your tummy area. So I decided to purchase 5 more pairs in the same size.. when I received these in the mail, they were totally different. They weren’t as long, or tight fitting. It was kinda loose in the thigh & leg area. It also included an extra pocket which is cool but I didn't like how loose they fit. So I am exchanging them for a smaller size & hoping these work better for me & which they did, they fit like the first pairs I bought! But overall, this is one of the best leggings I’ve own. I’ve worked in many high end retail stores & these Amazon leggings are amazing. I’m a professional house cleaner & deal with bleach & other chemicals and they have not bleach once, they are squat proof & just comfortable! They are extremely soft as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'6 150 lbs , the mediums are looser than I expected. They fit ; but slightly loose/baggy in the knees and groin. I definitely want a snug /tight fit; so I will be ordering a size small . I'm keeping the mediums for my " fat days " - lol !The material is not see through, which is great. They seem like they will not collect lint , and probably not likely to pill or collect sweater balls unless washed with towels etc- will maybe collect on the seams if so. I wear black stretch pants almost daily. These are definitely comfortable , they are high rise to my natural waist , are breathable yet thick enough to not be considered thin. The pockets are great perfect to carry my phone or small items in a pinch. I think the smalls will be more smoothing + snug for me . My hips/butt are 42" and my natural waist is 32" . My butt fills out the pants , my waist fits perfectly, my thighs fit , legs could be more snug... And the pants are loose at my knees - and are loose at the groin . If you have bigger thighs + hips , and knees than me- you will fill the looser areas out . The pants are definitely stretchy and long enough they reach my ankles .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfy and fit well. They are the tiniest bit long on me, but not enough to be annoying. The material is very soft and covers well, good thickness and great stretch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SMOOTH LIKE BUTTER
reviews.reviewText: After many attempts to find the perfect black leggings, I have finally found the holy grail! These are very flatting on. Big band at the top to hold all the extra goodness in ;-). Super soft and stretchy. And it has POCKETS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best work out pants EVER!!!
reviews.reviewText: I will never wear anything other than these yoga pants. Though I do not do yoga, I do run and they fit super well. They are made with very good quality material, they are high waisted and hold very well while I'm running. The side pockets for my phone is very handy for a hands free work out. I absolutely LOVE these yoga pants for anything and everything!!!! You will LOVE them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pockets, comfortable, seem durable, issue at seam
reviews.reviewText: I will not spend inordinate amounts of money on name-brand athletic clothes. I want high quality without paying for the celebrity endorsements of name brands. These do the job, although I think they should cost $15-$20. They're still not worth $28. They are flattering, comfortable, compression is just right--not too restricting. I just looked down at my seams and I see the seam is frazzled at the knee and this is the first time I'm wearing this pair (blue), so not sure what that will lead to. Overall I like the look and feel of these. I ordered 3 pairs so far: black, blue, and olive. Colors are like pics. I'm withholding five stars given the seam issue (given the price) and I'm going to see how they do after a few wears and washes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfort, no sag, hides everything and you can breathe
reviews.reviewText: Saw these reviewed in NYT. They were within my budget. 2 large functional pockets that are well positioned and don't add bulk. I have longer legs and they come past my ankle. I will buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for winter sport as they are thicker than cheap leggings. the pockets are nice and phone friendly. These are my favourite leggings bar lululemon and are so much more affordable! They last a good amount of time and when they eventually bobble it isn't extreme or bad. I have four pairs of black ones, I used to wear them while working with children and removing stains was super easy. They are too thick for mid summer wear but will be fantastic through the autumn, winter and spring. They are flattering, not baggy and the medium is perfect for a size 10/12. They are a little long on the legs if you are under 5ft 4 but not in a bad way, you cannot really see it and I don't worry about it, it doesn't look weird or mess with my footwear. I'd so go for it! None of my pairs have ever split! I also have 4 dogs and removing hair from them was nice and easy!
The best leggings that I bought in last 20 years
Pide dos y ambos son muy cómodas. Soy alta y delgada y la talla M me queda perfectamente.
